name: Decay (jellyfish team)
description:
Decay, a deceptive game.

To give Jellyfish the happiest and most decent life, play with it : look at the window, move  using the arrow keys (left and right) and jump (space bar), looking after the actions it can do.

Before you die.

Based upon Pippin Barr's Game Idea : You die, you go to heaven and you refuse to respawn. Freely Inspired by Philik k Dick's Ubic, I am alive and you are dead.
